Feats-General -- Male Versatile Heritage Human Rogue: 3
Strength: 12 (+1) Dexterity: 14 (+2) Constitution: 14 (+2) Intelligence: 12 (+1) Wisdom: 10 (+0) Charisma: 16 (+3)
Background: Acolyte Alignment: Chaotic Evil Deity: None
Experience: 2500/3000 Level: 3 Speed: 25 Size: Medium
Ability Notes:
Ability Boosts: Ability Boost (Choose 4 from any)
Armor Speed Penalty: -5 Speed
Fleet: +5 Speed
Breath Control: May hold breath 25x as long as usual without suffocating
Feather Step: May Step into difficult terrain
Hefty Hauler: x2 maximum and encumbered Bulk
Features/Skills
Feat Count: Ancestry: 2; Class: 3; General: 2; Skill: 3 Selectable Feature Count: Human (Heritage); Rogue (Key Ability); Rogue (Racket)
Feats: Adopted Ancestry (Elf); Ancestral Paragon; Armor Proficiency; Assurance (Deception); Breath Control; Canny Acumen (Fortitude); Canny Acumen (Perception); Canny Acumen (Reflex); Canny Acumen (Will); Diehard; Elven Weapon Familiarity; Expeditious Search; Fast Recovery; Feather Step; Fleet; Hefty Hauler; Incredible Initiative; Incredible Investiture; Minor Magic (Primal); Natural Ambition; Quick Coercion; Quick Draw; Ride; Shield Block; Toughness; Twin Feint; Untrained Improvisation; Weapon Proficiency (Bastard Sword) Rogue Features: Ability Boost (Charisma); Ability Boosts; Attack Trained (Simple Weapons; Rapier; Sap; Shortbow; Shortsword; Unarmed Attacks); Charisma; Class Trained (Rogue); Defense Trained (Light Armor; Unarmored Defense); Deny Advantage; General Feats; Key Ability; Perception Expert; Rogue Feats; Rogue Skills; Rogue's Racket; Save Expert (Reflex; Will); Save Trained (Fortitude); Scoundrel; Skill Feats; Skill Increases; Sneak Attack; Surprise Attack Acolyte Features: Ability Boost (Choose 1 from Intelligence, Wisdom; Choose 1 from any); Skill Trained (Religion; Scribing Lore); Student Of The Canon Human Features: Ability Boost (Choose 2 from any); Ancestry Feats; Versatile Heritage Human
Feature Notes:
Ancestral Paragon: +1 Ancestry Feat
Ancestry Feats: 1 selections
General Feats: 1 selections
Key Ability: 1 selection
Natural Ambition: +1 Class Feat
Rogue Feats: 2 selections
Rogue's Racket: 1 selection
Skill Feats: 3 selections
Versatile Heritage Human: +1 General Feat
Adopted Ancestry (Elf): May take Elf ancestry feats
Ride: Automatically succeeds when using Command an Animal to move/Mount acts on self turn
Perception: +7 (wisdom; expert)
Skill Modifiers:
Acrobatics: +5 (dexterity; trained) Engineering Lore: +6 (intelligence; trained) Religion: +5 (wisdom; trained)
Arcana: +2 (intelligence; untrained) Intimidation: +8 (charisma; trained) Scribing Lore: +6 (intelligence; trained)
Art Lore: +6 (intelligence; trained) Iomedae Lore: +6 (intelligence; trained) Society: +6 (intelligence; trained)
Athletics: +4 (strength; trained) Medicine: +1 (wisdom; untrained) Stealth: +5 (dexterity; trained)
Crafting: +2 (intelligence; untrained) Nature: +1 (wisdom; untrained) Survival: +1 (wisdom; untrained)
Deception: +12 (charisma; master) Occultism: +2 (intelligence; untrained) Thievery: +1 (dexterity; untrained)
Diplomacy: +8 (charisma; trained) Performance: +8 (charisma; trained)
Languages: Abyssal; Common; Gnomish
Skill Notes:
Armor Skill Penalty: -2 strength and dexterity skills
Canny Acumen (Perception): Perception Expert
Intelligence Language Bonus: +1 Language Count
Rogue Skills: Skill Trained (Stealth; Choose 8 from any)
Scoundrel: Skill Trained (Deception; Diplomacy)
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 2 from any)
Untrained Improvisation: +1 on untrained skill checks
Assurance (Deception): May forgo rolling a Deception check for an automatic 19
Expeditious Search: May Search at 2x normal Speed
Incredible Initiative: +2 on initiative rolls
Quick Coercion: May Coerce in 1 rd
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Combat
Hit Points: 41 Armor Class: 20 (dexterity (2 max); trained) Class DC: Rogue: 18 (charisma; trained)
Armor: Hide Shield: None Weapons: Bastard Sword (+6 1d8+1 S [2h d12]; strength; trained); Dagger (+7 1d4+1 P/S R10'; dexterity; trained); Scimitar (+1 1d6+1 S; strength; untrained)
Combat Notes:
Armor Proficiency: Defense Trained (Medium Armor)
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +6
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Elven Weapon Familiarity: Attack Trained (Longbow; Composite Longbow; Longsword; Rapier; Shortbow; Composite Shortbow)/Treats elf weapons as one category simpler
Strength Attack Adjustment: +1
Toughness: +3 Hit Points
Weapon Proficiency (Bastard Sword): Attack Trained (Bastard Sword)
Deny Advantage: Does not suffer flat-footed to foes of equal or lower level
Diehard: Remains alive until dying 5
Elven Weapon Familiarity: Has access to uncommon elf weapons
Quick Draw: May use 1 action to draw a weapon and Strike
Scoundrel: A successful Feint inflicts flat-footed on foe vs. self attacks (critical success all attacks) for until the end of your next turn
Shield Block: May use a Reaction when shield is raised to negate damage up to its hardness and have it absorb half of remaining damage
Sneak Attack: +1d6 HP damage vs. flat-footed foe with agile, finesse, or ranged weapons
Surprise Attack: May use Deception or Stealth for initiative to inflict flat-footed on creatures that haven't acted
Twin Feint: May use 2 actions to Strike with each hand, inflicting flat-footed on the second
Save: Fortitude: +9 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +9 (dexterity; expert); Will: +7 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes:
Canny Acumen (Fortitude): Save Expert (Fortitude)
Canny Acumen (Reflex): Save Expert (Reflex)
Canny Acumen (Will): Save Expert (Will)
Breath Control: +1 vs. inhaled threats/Success vs. inhaled threat is always a critical success
Fast Recovery: Regains 2x Hit Points and drained severity from rest/Successful Fortitude vs. an ongoing disease or poison reduces its stage by 2, or 1 if virulent; critical success by 3, or 2 if virulent
Toughness: -1 DC on recovery checks
Magic
Spell Slots: P0: 2 Attack: Primal: +8 (charisma; trained) Spell DC: Primal: 18 (charisma; trained)
Magic Notes:
Minor Magic (Primal): Spell Trained (Primal)
Incredible Investiture: May invest 12 items
Minor Magic (Primal): Knows 2 primal cantrips
Notes
Validation Errors:
Expeditious Search Feat: Requires level (currently 3) >= 7 and perception (currently 7) >= 2
General Feats Allocation: 2 available vs. 20 allocated
Incredible Investiture Feat: Requires level (currently 3) >= 11 and charisma (currently 16) >= 16
